<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection/><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Add Jira Attachment</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
  var gr = new GlideRecord('x_momo_jira_integr_issue_attachment');
  if (gr.get('attachment', current.getUniqueValue())) {
    gs.eventQueue('x_momo_jira_integr.attachment.added');
  }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>douglas.schamberg@movement.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-26 12:38:42</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>e93f32ca1baa445048a242e58d4bcb0f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Add Jira Attachment</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Integration" source="x_momo_jira_integr">ec964aa3dbd2c810f25513296896194c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Integration">ec964aa3dbd2c810f25513296896194c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e93f32ca1baa445048a242e58d4bcb0f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>douglas.schamberg@movement.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-26 12:38:42</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e93f32ca1baa445048a242e58d4bcb0f"/></record_update>
